name: Heli Hero
description:
Overview:

Heli Hero is a Third-person 2D pixel Atari game. In this game, you will act as the rescue robot. Your goal is to clear the path to go down and rescue all the workers trapped in the mine. You will use your joystick to control the robot's movement, place the bomb, and use the attack button to kill the monsters getting in your way!

This game is a remake version of the Atari 2600 game H.E.R.O(1984).

Controls:
  • Move left, up, and right: Joystick(left-Up-Right) or Keyboard(A-W-D)
  • Set a bomb behind you: Joystick(Down) or Keyboard(S)
  • Set a bomb in front of you: Joystick(Down) +(Left or Right) or Keyboard(S) + (A or D) depends on the direction you are going
  • Shoot: A button(on XBOX controller)/X button(on PS controller) or Space Bar(keyboard)
Goal: Blast your way to the bottom of the mine, kill the annoying monsters, and bring All the trapped miners up to the ground safely! Creators:

Cesar Nazario: Game Design/Programming

Evelyn You: Character Art/UI Design/Project Manager

Gavin Guan: Game Design/Programming/SFX

Luke Qian: Level Art/Level Design
